title: Can I accept a marriage proposal from someone who has haram income? - Assim al Hakeem
transcript: afrina says how much is it important for a girl not to marry a person whose earning is interest based there is a hadith which says if though husband's earning is haram but it is halal for his wife i don't know of such a hadith that states this as you have mentioned afrina but yes a person whose income is haram and he proposes definitely it is not permissible for you to marry someone as such someone who is dealing in haram his income is haram then this is not permissible to marry him
